content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was negotiating the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg. It was an unfurnished, one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] What did you first offer as the rental price for the apartment?
[Answer] I first offered the rental price at 500 Euro per month.

[Question] What was the landlord's initial reaction to your first offer?
[Answer] The landlord acknowledged that 500 Euro per month was a fair price, but he was also looking for the highest possible rent.

[Question] At what price did the negotiation finally end?
[Answer] The negotiation ended at a price of 485 Euro per month.

[Question] What was the landlord's last offer before you agreed on the price?
[Answer] The landlord's last offer before we agreed on the price was 485 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] Did you agree on a final price?
[Answer] Yes, we agreed on a final price of 485 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner?
[Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner at 10.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended?
[Answer] No
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
[Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang
